Posts.Content: susiepor wrote: Ifound out i have to have a double mast dec 7th i was wondering if they send you home that day after the surgery or will i spend the nite?and the pain what do they send you home with,i went for my pre opt today and the anthelogiast[i spelled that wrong,told me that since i was having a double mast the surgson/ would want me him to put the iv  in my neck,and this just flipped me out,i was wondering if anyone else has had to have their iv put in their neck and how bad did it hurt,i just cant imagine,i was scared before now it has doubled,please help me, Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: found out oct 27th susiepor debbie6122
